name: Hackathon
tagline: We're having water trouble, we're moving to coffee shops and the park
body:
### Where are we right now?
We've headed to local coffee shops and parks while we wait (hope) that the plumbing gets fixed at Etsy. We'll meet back at 1pm for lunch, and then hopefully it will be fixed by then. If not, we'll head back out. Thanks for being cool about this. <3

If you want to find the main group and work on one of our awesome projects, head to [Brooklyn Roasting Company](https://www.brooklynroasting.com/).

If you're interested in Leah's Intro to GitHub class, head to the [Brooklyn Bridge Park](https://goo.gl/maps/nBiK3).

### Today's Schedule
Morning >- 1pm: Work at coffee shops and parks

1pm - 2pm: Pick up free lunch at Etsy offices, stay there or head to the park. ALSO: If you want to take Shannon's python class, some of our awesome ladies are hosting an installation station to get you set up and ready for class.

2pm: More hacking OR Shannon's Python Class!

3pm - 5pm: Hacking!

5pm: Present projects

Text Leah at 202-412-4509 if you need.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
